ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This vinaigrette does not separate for at least 30 minutes once you shake it! Simple, sweet, and savory."
ins: Combine the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, Dijon mustard, shallot, garlic, salt, and black pepper together in a glass jar with a lid. Replace lid on the jar and shake vigorously until thoroughly combined.
